name: qucom-sdk
description: QUCOM - Quantum Computing SDK in JS/WASM

scripts.build:web: wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg/web && rm -rf pkg/web/.gitignore
scripts.build:node: wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir pkg/node && rm -rf pkg/node/.gitignore
scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:node

author: Ethan Zhang
